item.title: Alexandria
item.author: marc@hrmn.dev (Marc Hermann)
item.description: With Alexandria, users learn languages by translating texts. The app keeps track of previously encountered words and phrases, and by highlighting those in a text according to their level of familiarity. Co-created with two fellow software engineers.

item.title: ThrSqr
item.author: marc@hrmn.dev (Marc Hermann)
item.description: Are you tired of your team’s / choir’s / book club’s (etc.) message group getting cluttered by “Who’s coming?!” messages every week? Then it is time you tried ThrSqr.
